message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $150 by you. Considering its quality and unique features, I believe it would greatly benefit your needs. I am offering this exceptional item to you today for $130. This is a special opportunity to acquire it at a price that is higher than what most people pay but still offers a significant saving compared to its original value. Please let me know if you're interested in securing this deal.
